title: Make Admin Panel button clear and deep pink for admins

requirements.text: Update the Admin navigation entry in the header so that when the current user is an admin, the Admin Panel entry point is rendered as a clear, high-visibility deep pink button (not a subtle/ghost link). Apply this styling for both the desktop navigation and the mobile menu entry.

quotes: Make clear & visible Admin Panel in deep pink color button

acceptanceCriteria: When `isAdmin === true`, the header shows an "Admin Panel" button with a deep pink background (e.g., hex #FF1493 or equivalent Tailwind arbitrary color) and readable high-contrast text.
The desktop header Admin button is visually distinct from other nav items (not `variant="ghost"`) and is immediately noticeable.
The mobile menu Admin Panel entry uses the same deep pink button styling and remains readable.
Hover/active/focus states preserve deep pink styling and include an accessible focus indicator.
When `isAdmin === false`, the Admin button is not shown (existing access logic remains unchanged).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Keep existing admin access control behavior (Admin Panel route remains restricted to admins).
nonGoals: Changing admin authorization rules or backend admin detection logic.
Adding new admin features inside the Admin Panel page.
Changing the routing scheme (hash routes) for the Admin Panel.
